section.title: credit memos printing of Print Credit Memos
section.para: Printing a Credit Memo is a required step in the process of posting a Credit Memo. To print a Credit Memo, select the "Print Credit Memos" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing Credit Memos, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to automatically post Credit Memos after they have been printed.

note.para: Credit Memos are posted effective on the date they are distributed, not on the date they are posted--as might be assumed.

listitem.para: Specify details for the Credit Memo copies you want to print.
# of Copies: Indicate the number of copies you want to print using the arrow buttons. Information about the specified copies will display below. To add a Watermark, double-click on a copy line.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing Credit Memos, returning you to the application desktop.
Prints all Credit Memos available for printing, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To add a Watermark to a Credit Memo, double-click on a copy line. The following screen will appear:
When adding a Watermark to a Credit Memo copy, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the name of the Watermark to be used for the selected copy.
Select to show Prices in the selected copy.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without adding a Watermark, returning you to the previous screen.
Saves the Watermark definition to the selected copy.
